amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 118-578 to prohibit funds being made available by this Act to the Congressional Office of International Leadership.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in this Act from being made available to the Congressional Office for International Leadership.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huizenga amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 240 (Roll no. 348).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Huizenga amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 240 (Roll no. 348).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
